game.title: The Missing Merchant
game.description: The merchant, Geralt, has gone missing during a trip to a nearby village. His wife has hired you to find him and bring him back home.

task.objective: Talk to the villagers in the village of Byways.
task.description: Talk to the villagers there for information about Geralt's whereabouts.

task.objective: Search the forest of Whispering Trees.
task.description: Examine the forest for any clues that might lead to him.

task.objective: Follow the clues to the cave in the mountains.
task.description: 遵循线索前往山中的洞穴。

task.objective: Defeat the bandits and rescue Geralt.
task.description: 击败扣押Geralt的匪徒并救他出来。
task.location: The bandit camp in the mountains

task.objective: Return Geralt to Triss at the village of Byways.
